00012 void showFreq( PairCount& pairs, SingleCount& singlesF, SingleCount& singlesE, Lexicon& f, Lexicon& e)
00013 {
00014         for (pairs.begin(); !pairs.isEnd(); pairs.next())
00015         {
00016                 pair<unsigned int, unsigned int> wordpair = pairs.current();
00017                 double relFreq_f = -log(((double)pairs.getFreq(wordpair))/((double)singlesF.getFreq(wordpair.first)));
00018                 double relFreq_e = -log(((double)pairs.getFreq(wordpair))/((double)singlesE.getFreq(wordpair.second)));
00019                 cout << relFreq_f << " " << relFreq_e << " # " << f.getWord(wordpair.first) << " # " << e.getWord(wordpair.second) << endl;
00020         }
00021 }
